muthurajawela pihiti akkara 10ka idam kotasak ghana apadrawya mangin balashakthiya nipadawime wyapruthiyak sandaha badu dima ghana apadrawya bahara kirime gataluwata wisandumak washayen ghana apadrawya mangin widuliya jananaya kirime wyapruthiyak kriyathmaka kirima sandaha muthurajawela pradeshaye pihiti, shri lanka idam godakirime ha sanwardhanaya kirime sansthawa sathu akkara 10ka idam kotasak 30 awurudu badu padanama matha paudgalika samagamak wetha badu dima pinisa mahanagara ha basnahira sanwardhana amathya patali champika ranawaka mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin prathipaththimaya washayen anumatha karana ladi.

shri lankawe anka 01 dantharakshakaya wana yuniliwar samagame signal sannamaya, thama 60 wasarak samarana mohothe ‘ape sinahawath kalawak ’ yana themawa osse sina bo wewa wadasatahana diyath kala athara, ihatha dumriya mangin shri lanka dantha waidyawarunge sangamaya ha ekwa nomile dath parikshawan 15,000kata adhika pramanayak sidu kirimata balaporoththu we.

‘sewa sthanaye giwisume thiyana padi nolabima, niwaradiwa aaharapana laba nodima, saukhya sampanna widihata owunta salakanne nathi eka, ee wagema sharirika washayen wada hinsanayata bhajanaya wima, ethanin ehata gihin lingika adamthettam sidu kirima kiyana me siyalu aakarayakama prashna wenuwen deshiya niyojithaya wagakiwa yuthuyi.’
